languages.text: "Почти любого планетарного губернатора потряси, и с него высыпется ворох ереси — нашла чем удивить, ксенос. Но если Вьятт в чем-то и виновна, ее будут судить не по твоим словам".

"Give just about any planetary governor a hard-enough shake, and a whole slew of heresies will come pouring out, so we are not as shocked as you might think, xenos. Regardless, if Vyatt is guilty of anything, she will not be judged based on your word."
languages.original_text: "Почти любого планетарного губернатора потряси, и с него высыпется ворох ереси — нашла чем удивить, ксенос. Но если Вьятт в чем-то и виновна, ее будут судить не по твоим словам".

traits.locale_text: "If you shake just about any planetary governor hard enough, a whole slew of heresies will come pouring out, so we are not as shocked as you might think, xenos. Regardless, if Vyatt is guilty of anything, she won't be judged based on your word."

"If you shake just about any planetary governor hard enough, a whole slew of heresies will come pouring out, so we are not as shocked as you might think, xenos. Regardless, if Vyatt is guilty of anything, she won't be judged based on your word."

"Give just about any planetary governor a hard-enough shake, and a whole slew of heresies will come pouring out, so we are not as shocked as you might think, xenos. Regardless, if Vyatt is guilty of anything, she will not be judged based on your word."

"Give just about any planetary governor a hard-enough shake, and a whole slew of heresies will come pouring out, so we are not as shocked as you might think, xenos. Regardless, if Vyatt is guilty of anything, she will not be judged based on your word."

"Give just about any planetary governor a hard-enough shake, and a whole slew of heresies will come pouring out, so we are not as shocked as you might think, xenos. Regardless, if Vyatt is guilty of anything, she will not be judged based on your word."

"Give just about any planetary governor a hard-enough shake, and a whole slew of heresies will come pouring out, so we are not as shocked as you might think, xenos. Regardless, if Vyatt is guilty of anything, she will not be judged based on your word."

languages.text: “只要抓住一个行星总督使劲摇晃，就能摇出一大堆异端分子，因此我们并不像你想象得那么震惊，异形。不过，就算维亚特真的犯了什么罪，你的证词也不会影响审判结果。”
languages.original_text: "Give just about any planetary governor a hard-enough shake, and a whole slew of heresies will come pouring out, so we are not as shocked as you might think, xenos. Regardless, if Vyatt is guilty of anything, she will not be judged based on your word."

traits.locale_text: “只要抓住一个行星总督使劲摇晃，就能摇出一大堆异端分子，因此我们并不像你想象得那么震惊，异形。不过，就算维亚特真的犯了什么罪，你的证词也不会影响审判结果。”

languages.text: «Basta con zarandear a cualquier gobernador planetario para que caiga un torrente de herejías, así que no estamos tan sorprendidos como crees, xenos. Independientemente, si Vyatt es culpable de algo, no será juzgada por tus palabras».
languages.original_text: "Give just about any planetary governor a hard-enough shake, and a whole slew of heresies will come pouring out, so we are not as shocked as you might think, xenos. Regardless, if Vyatt is guilty of anything, she will not be judged based on your word."

traits.locale_text: «Basta con zarandear a cualquier gobernador planetario para que caiga un torrente de herejías, así que no estamos tan sorprendidos como crees, xenos. Independientemente, si Vyatt es culpable de algo, no será juzgada por tus palabras».

languages.text: « Il suffit de secouer assez fort n'importe quel gouverneur planétaire pour qu'il admette un flot d'hérésies jusque-là inconnues. Nous ne sommes donc pas aussi choqués que vous semblez le penser, xénos. Dans tous les cas, si Vyatt est bien coupable, elle ne sera pas jugée sur la base de vos seules déclarations. »
languages.original_text: "Give just about any planetary governor a hard-enough shake, and a whole slew of heresies will come pouring out, so we are not as shocked as you might think, xenos. Regardless, if Vyatt is guilty of anything, she will not be judged based on your word."

traits.locale_text: « Il suffit de secouer assez fort n'importe quel gouverneur planétaire pour qu'il admette un flot d'hérésies jusque-là inconnues. Nous ne sommes donc pas aussi choqués que vous semblez le penser, xénos. Dans tous les cas, si Vyatt est bien coupable, elle ne sera pas jugée sur la base de vos seules déclarations. »

languages.text: 「どんな惑星の総督でも強く揺さぶれば、たくさんの異端がこぼれ出てくるものだ。だから、俺たちは異種族のお前が思うほどには驚いていない。それに、もしビャットが何か罪を犯しているとしても、お前の言葉だけで裁かれることはない」
languages.original_text: "Give just about any planetary governor a hard-enough shake, and a whole slew of heresies will come pouring out, so we are not as shocked as you might think, xenos. Regardless, if Vyatt is guilty of anything, she will not be judged based on your word."

traits.locale_text: 「どんな惑星の総督でも強く揺さぶれば、たくさんの異端がこぼれ出てくるものだ。だから、俺たちは異種族のお前が思うほどには驚いていない。それに、もしビャットが何か罪を犯しているとしても、お前の言葉だけで裁かれることはない」

languages.text: "Herhangi bir gezegen valisini yeterince zorlarsanız ceplerinden bir dolu kâfirlik dökülüverir. Yani beklediğin kadar şaşırmadık zeno. Vyatt'ın bir suçu varsa bile senin lafınla yargılanacak değil."
languages.original_text: "Give just about any planetary governor a hard-enough shake, and a whole slew of heresies will come pouring out, so we are not as shocked as you might think, xenos. Regardless, if Vyatt is guilty of anything, she will not be judged based on your word."

traits.locale_text: "Herhangi bir gezegen valisini yeterince zorlarsanız ceplerinden bir dolu kâfirlik dökülüverir. Yani beklediğin kadar şaşırmadık zeno. Vyatt'ın bir suçu varsa bile senin lafınla yargılanacak değil."

languages.text: "Wenn man einen beliebigen Planetengouverneur stark genug schüttelt, fallen automatisch jede Menge Ketzereien heraus, und darum sind wir nicht so schockiert, wie Ihr vielleicht glaubt, Xenos. Wie auch immer, wenn Vyatt sich schuldig gemacht hat, wird sie nicht nur wegen Eures Worts verurteilt."
languages.original_text: "Give just about any planetary governor a hard-enough shake, and a whole slew of heresies will come pouring out, so we are not as shocked as you might think, xenos. Regardless, if Vyatt is guilty of anything, she will not be judged based on your word."

traits.locale_text: "Wenn man einen beliebigen Planetengouverneur stark genug schüttelt, fallen automatisch jede Menge Ketzereien heraus, und darum sind wir nicht so schockiert, wie Ihr vielleicht glaubt, Xenos. Wie auch immer, wenn Vyatt sich schuldig gemacht hat, wird sie nicht nur wegen Eures Worts verurteilt."
